Html:
I am not being able to update the title of the ribbon window during other than the first time - I am sure this is a bug because the title in the task bar is updated, only not in the title of the ribbon.

For example, if I do this at any point in my window:

Title = "It's a new title";

It does update in the taskbar, but it doesn't update the titlebar of my ribbon window.

(if I do this before InitializeComponent(); or in my XAML it does update).

 

But I need to update after that and am not going to initialize all components because of this. Does anyone know how to workaround this? Or is this bug going to be solver?
